Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Hevn::
       He stands up from where he was sitting and walks around the table to 
sit right next to Blackstorm.  He puts his hand on her shoulder comfortingly. 
 "You can't remember your past because you were reprogrammed when you were 
captured.  As for people finding out why I'm here... well, Flicker already 
knows.  At least he knows more or less.  Wherever you decide to go, I'll be 
there."  He squeezes her shoulder gently and looks into her eyes.

--part1_138.1f281d62.2be4ae9e_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
